name: Side Effects May Include
description:
Made in 48 hours for Gamemakers Toolkit Jam #1 with Joszs https://joszs.itch.io

All art by Joszs, with sound and music by Seanarooni.

Press space, left control, or left shift start the game. 

Obvious spoilers, so don't read this before you play the game =P. The player lives in a house and must survive by sleeping and eating. Food costs money, and to earn money you have to work. You have a job as a test subject in a lab which can have some nasty side effects for the player.  You must go to work to pay for food, but work makes it harder for you to survive due to unintended side effects.
